summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 29, 2019. It details inmate movements, staffing, and operational notes. Most significantly, it records inmate Jeffrey Epstein being on 'Psych Obs.' (psychiatric observation) with an inmate companion, just over two weeks before his death.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Psychiatric Observation
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein is documented as being on psychiatric observation with an inmate companion at MCC New York.

events.title: Daily Inmate Movements at MCC
events.description: Routine daily report of inmate admissions, releases, and placements in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on psychiatric observation ('Psych Obs.') at MCC New York on July 29, 2019.
The report indicates Epstein had an 'inmate companion' while on psychiatric observation.
The document is dated July 30, 2019, and reports on activity from July 29, 2019, approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The report notes staffing shortages affecting correctional assignments, specifically '10-South #2' being unassigned.
Several other inmates were placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) or were in outside hospitals under guard.
